activities: CoreLogic, Inc. is a leading provider of risk mitigation and business solutions. It offers a number of services such as consumer and business credit and fraud risk related information in the mortgage, automotive and specialty financing markets; lead generation services; analytics; insurance services; and resident screening. Some of these services are conducted by performing searches with the major credit bureaus and/or public records databases and certain information is also received from CoreLogic’s customers. These services may include the transmittal of personal data from the European Union related to current, former and potential consumers, customers and suppliers related to the above activities; and the physical transfer of documents or media.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
